item.title: Deploying to Kubernetes
item.description: Deploying KrakenD in Kubernetes requires a straightforward configuration. Create a Dockerfile that includes the configuration of the service. That should be as simple as: FROM devopsfaith/krakend COPY krakend.json /etc/krakend/krakend.json If you use flexible-configuration you might want to add a previous generation of the krakend.json file using a multi-step Docker. From here you need to create a NodePort and send all the traffic to KrakenD. Deployment definition YAML The KrakenD deployment definition, in a file called deployment-definition.
